title: Opinion: Iger gets the activist investor off Disney’s back, but there is plenty more to do
description: So far, the return of Bob Iger as Disney's chief executive is going as Wall Street had hoped, but Iger and Disney still have lots of things to figure out.

title: Bulls Back in Driver’s Seat For Moment as Buyers Resurface Following Heavy Selloff - Lyft (NASDAQ:LYFT), Walt Disney (NYSE:DIS)
description: (Thursday Market Open) Investors swooped back in and snapped up stocks early Thursday after yesterday’s heavy sell-off, perhaps a sign that a decent pool of potential buyers is still out there for the time being.
